means: 判断不当的，不聪明的，浅薄的

sentence.Network_en: He blamed injudicious comments by bankers for last week's devaluation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将上周的货币贬值归咎于银行家所作的不当评论。

sentence.Network_en: She had not the habit of taking injudicious risks in any market.
sentence.Network_cn: 她没有在任何市场上傻头傻脑地采取冒险行动的习惯.

sentence.Network_en: Now would be an injudicious moment to ask for a rise.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在要求加薪不是时候.

PerfectNetExp.abs: injudicial 不守法律的injudicious 判断不当的Injun 印第安人
孤注一掷... ... 6. Unintelligible or foolish talk. 不明智或愚蠢的话 7. lacking discretion;injudicious. 缺少判断力；不明智。.
injudicious 不聪明的, injudicious 失算的, injudicious 判断欠妥的
injudicial 不照法律形式的, injudicious 不慎重的, injudicial 不聪明的

list.abs: injector 注射器injudicial 不守法律的injudicious 判断不当的
arrest indiscriminately 不加以区别地逮捕arrest injudiciously 不公道地逮捕arrest unjustly 非正义地逮捕

美国大学翻译中文 3 - geovindu的日志 -... ... 不智 unwise 不智地 injudiciously 不曾 never.

entry.tran: 不明智的;缺乏判断力的;考虑不周到的
entry.def: If you describe a person or something that they have done as injudicious, you are critical of them because they have shown very poor judgment.

example.ex: He blamed injudicious comments by bankers for last week's devaluation.
example.tran: 他将上周的货币贬值归咎于银行家所作的不当评论。

means.word_mean: 1. lacking or showing lack of judgment or discretion; unwise;

auth_sentence.content: The remark had been injudicious and...undeniably impudent.
auth_sentence.res_content: The remark had been injudicious and...undeniably impudent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The remark had been injudicious and...undeniably impudent.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+judicious[adj.有判断力的,明智的]→adj.不明智的;不慎重的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的
